hero.headline: Building a sanctuary for the mind in a noisy world.
hero.subheadline: Since we cannot silence the world, let us help you find your own frequency.

about.title: May we all regain the right to steer our own ships in this flood of data.
about.body:
We live in an era of hyper-connectivity.

From the moment we open our eyes, text messages, social feeds, and the tug-of-war of relationships act like invisible threads, attempting to manipulate our lives. Do you also feel that we are so busy responding to the world that we forget to leave time for ourselves?

I am a bio-mechatronics student from Pingtung.
Inside a laboratory filled with the hum of machinery and lines of code, I am not a person of many words; some might even call me solitary. But I found that it is precisely this feeling of being "out of place" that allows me to see the essence hidden by the noise. I dislike complex social calculations, but I love the pure order brought by systems.

Oryn was not born from a grand slogan to change the world.
It is a digital sanctuary built for myself, and for those like you who yearn to preserve their true selves amidst the chaos.

I am attempting to use technology to return life to living, and the brain to thinking.
If you are also tired of the endless static, welcome here for a rest.

I am the developer of Oryn, a quiet architect guarding this silence behind the keyboard.

deepflow.name: DeepFlow
deepflow.slogan: Let your digital environment adapt to your focus frequency.
deepflow.description: DeepFlow utilizes 'Context Awareness' technology to recognize your **Deep Work patterns**. When you are immersed in code or design, it identifies the rhythm of your workflow. Without manual setup, it automatically raises a digital barrier against irrelevant noise. It safeguards your efficiency while strictly respecting your privacy—processing data locally to ensure your flow state remains as secure and free as your data.

synapse.name: Synapse
synapse.slogan: Automatically restructuring chaotic fragments into an ordered knowledge graph.
synapse.description: Stop wasting time manually tagging and filing. Synapse is your automated second brain architect. Simply dump articles, random ideas, or voice memos into the system. Our AI performs semantic analysis to auto-tag your notes and surface hidden connections with your past ideas. You input the chaos; we output the logic.

resonance.name: Resonance
resonance.description: We don't need your selfies. Resonance is a closed network for builders. We hide avatars and likes, focusing instead on your 'Current Projects,' 'Tech Stack,' and 'Vision.' The algorithm filters out idle chatter, opening communication channels only when skills match and visions resonate. This isn't for killing time; it's for assembling a special forces team.

wishlist.title: It is not perfect yet, but we are willing to listen to your voice.
wishlist.description: Oryn is a growing organism, and your needs are its nutrients. Tell us, what kind of order do you need?

cta.title: May you be among the first travelers to return to the essence.
cta.description: The Oryn ecosystem is being quietly constructed. We promise not to send spam that disturbs your life; we will only send you an invitation regarding "Order" and "Evolution" when we are ready.
cta.placeholder: Enter your email to reserve your journey back to self.

footer.email: Always welcome to write and talk with me

hero.headline: 在喧囂的世界裡，為心靈築一座安放的島嶼。
hero.subheadline: 既然無法讓世界安靜，不如讓我們陪你找回內心的頻率。

about.title: 願我們都能在數據的洪流中，找回掌舵的權利。
about.body:
我們身處在一個過度連結的時代。

每天睜開眼，無數條看不見的線——社群的焦慮、人情的拉扯、資訊的轟炸——都在試圖操控我們的生活。你是否也常在夜深人靜時感到疲憊：我們忙著回應全世界，卻唯獨忘了留時間給自己？

我是來自屏東的大學生，主修生物機電。
在充滿機械運轉聲與程式碼的實驗室裡，我不善言辭，甚至有些孤僻。但我發現，正是這份與人群的格格不入，讓我看清了那些被噪音掩蓋的本質。我不喜歡複雜的人際算計，但我熱愛系統帶來的純粹與秩序。

Oryn 的誕生，不是為了改變世界這種宏大的口號。
它是我為自己、也為像你一樣渴望在混亂中保有自我的人，所搭建的一座數位避難所。

我正在嘗試用技術，把生活還給生活，把大腦還給思考。
如果你也厭倦了無止盡的雜訊，歡迎來到這裡休息片刻。

我是 Oryn 的開發者，一個在鍵盤後，安靜守護這份寧靜的建築師。

deepflow.name: DeepFlow｜深度流
deepflow.slogan: 讓數位環境，自動適應您的專注頻率。
deepflow.description: DeepFlow 採用先進的情境感知技術。當您沉浸於代碼或設計稿時，它能識別這種**深度工作模式**的獨特節奏。無需您手動設定，系統便會自動築起數位圍牆，將不相關的干擾溫柔地隔絕在外。這是一場不僅守護效率，更尊重隱私的體驗——所有數據皆在本地運算，讓您的心流與數據一樣，安全且自由。

synapse.name: Synapse｜思維突觸
synapse.slogan: 把混亂的碎片，自動重組成有序的知識圖譜。
synapse.description: 別再花時間手動整理標籤與資料夾了。Synapse 是您的第二大腦自動化架構師。您只需要將閱讀到的文章、深夜的靈感、或是零散的語音備忘錄隨手「丟」進來。我們的 AI 會進行語意分析，自動為筆記加上標籤，並找出它與您過去筆記之間的潛在關聯。它讓您的知識不再是死寂的文字檔案，而是像神經元一樣彼此連結、生長。您只管輸入混亂，我們負責輸出邏輯。

resonance.name: Resonance｜頻率共振
resonance.slogan: 透過「野心」與「價值觀」算法，尋找創業路上的共同創辦人。
resonance.description: 我們不需要看您的自拍或午餐照片。Resonance 是一個專為創造者設計的封閉式網絡。我們隱藏了頭像與按讚數，要求您輸入的是您的「正在構建的專案」、「擅長的技能堆疊」以及「對未來的願景」。演算法會過濾掉 99% 的無效寒暄，僅在雙方技能互補且願景共振時，才會開啟對話通道。這不是用來殺時間的社群媒體，這是用來組建那支能改變現狀的特種部隊。

wishlist.title: 這裡還不完美，但我們願意傾聽你的聲音。
wishlist.description: Oryn 是一個正在生長的有機體，而你的需求，是它的養分。告訴我們你需要什麼樣的秩序？

cta.description: Oryn 生態系正在靜謐地建構中。我們承諾不發送干擾生活的垃圾郵件，只會在我們準備好的時候，寄送給您一封關於秩序與進化的邀請函。
